const areas = [ 'Dhaka', 'Chittagong', 'Rajshahi', 'Khulna', 'Barisal', 'Sylhet', 'Rangpur', 'Mymensingh', 'Dhaka North', 'Dhaka South', 'Narayanganj', 'Gazipur', 'Tangail', 'Narsingdi', 'Comilla', 'Noakhali', 'Feni', 'Lakshmipur', 'Chandpur', 'Brahmanbaria' ];
